name: When adding an item to the basket, it increases count by 1
scenarioId: Inventory:When adding an item to the basket, it increases count by 1
methodName: When adding an item to the basket, it increases count by 1

testSteps.description: Given I am logged in as a registered user
When I view the inventory page
And I add the first product to my basket
Then the basket count should increase by 1

userStory.narrative:
In order to purchase items,
  As a registered user I want to be able to see products available to buy,
  So that I can choose items to add to my cart.
